pages.text: I'll need to be light on my feet if I want to avoid getting hurt from monsters. Dodging at the right time can be the difference between life and death.$(br2)$(#a84b0f)$(italics)Pressing left ALT while using the WASD keys will allow you to dodge in that direction.$()

I do have to keep in mind that wearing heavier armor will significantly impact my ability to dodge. Some armors are too heavy to even dodge in at all. I'll have to be smart about which armor I choose and weigh the pros and cons.
